awardEventDetails.for: Breakthrough British/Irish Filmmaker of the Year

awardEventDetails.title: 2016 Winner Outstanding Performer of the Year Award
2016 Winner Outstanding Director of the Year Award
2016 Winner Breakthrough Performance Award
awardEventDetails.description: Brie Larson ("Brie Larson breathes vibrant life into the character of Ma from Emma Donoghue's best-selling novel Room. Larson delivers a performance of great warmth, deep reserves of courage and strong empathy as a committed parent determined to make sure her son is taken care of under unimaginable circmstances," said Film Festival Chairman Harold Matzner. "For this stand-out performance, it is an honor to present her with the 2016 Breakthrough Performance Award.")

awardEventDetails.title: 2016 Winner Artios Award
awardEventDetails.for: Outstanding Achievement in Casting - Studio or Independent Feature - Drama
awardEventDetails.description: Fiona Weir - Robin D. Cook - Jonathan Oliveira (associate)

awardEventDetails.title: 2016 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (ROOM opens a window into a world of darkness - a harrowing nightmare for a mother and son held captive in unimaginable circumstances. Amidst the horror, Lenny Abrahamson creates an expansive space filled with wonder, and tenacious performances from Brie Larson and Jacob Tremblay illuminate the power of imagination and hope, while asking us to consider the cost of survival.)
